name: hlph

stmt.origin: simprbi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, ccphlo), wcel(c0, ccbn))
stmt.pretty: simprbi(c0 ∈ CHilOLD, c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD, c0 ∈ CBan)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, ccphlo))
-| wb(wcel(c0, chlo), wa(wcel(c0, ccbn), wcel(c0, ccphlo)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD ↔(c0 ∈ CBan ∧ c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, ccphlo))
-| wb(wcel(c0, chlo), wa(wcel(c0, ccbn), wcel(c0, ccphlo)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD ↔(c0 ∈ CBan ∧ c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD))

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, chlo), wa(wcel(c0, ccbn), wcel(c0, ccphlo)))

comment: Every complex Hilbert space is an inner product space (also called a pre-Hilbert space). (Contributed by NM, 28-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
